articles.title: 10 burning questions about the 2025 Patriots ahead of their season opener
articles.description:
The Patriots have a lot of questions to answer. Here are a few to think about.

The post 10 burning questions about the 2025 Patriots ahead of their season opener appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Patriots face critical decisions ahead of their season opener on September 10, 2025.
Questions arise about rookie quarterback Drake Maye's readiness and team dynamics.
Local fans are eager for clarity on team performance impacting game attendance.

articles.title: Did you follow the local news this week? Take our Greater Boston news quiz.
articles.description:
A zippy train, a peppy pop star, and a moving move-in day are all part of this week’s news quiz.

The post Did you follow the local news this week? Take our Greater Boston news quiz. appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Acela train service continues to enhance travel options for Boston commuters.
Pop star Benson Boone performed in Allston on September 5, attracting local fans.
Move-in day for Boston students impacts local housing and community dynamics.
